filename

Contact info with z and formation

*/output/contacts4.csv or contacts_clean.csv

*/tmp/raw_contacts.csv

*/output/faults.csv

*/tmp/basal_contacts.shp

*/tmp/geol_clip.shp

*/tmp/faults_clip.shp & */tmp/faults_clip_data.shp

*/tmp/folds_clip.shp

*/output/ign_contacts.csv

*/output/formation_thicknesses_norm.csv and formation_summary_thickness.csv

*/output/fault_dimensions.csv

Fault displacements

*/output/fault_displacement3.csv

Fault strat & thickness-based displacements

*/output/fault_strat_offset3.csv

*/output/fault_tip_contacts*.csv

filename

*/tmp/interpolated_combined.csv

*/output /ign_orientations*.csv

filename

Gempy
